title: UCSD Center For Student Involvement - Student Organization Registration
main_content: UCSD Student Organizations (2023 - 2024) Society of Undergraduate Mathematics Students (SUMS) Academic Department Affiliated Category Academic Year 2023 Purpose SUMS provides resources, workshops, talks, and social events for UCSD’s mathematics community with the goal of promoting mathematics and related fields. Created 8/14/2023 Status Current Organization Type Undergraduate Organization Email sums@ucsd.edu Social Media sumsucsd Society of Undergraduate Mathematics Students (SUMS) Principal Members Shir Levin sblevin@ucsd.edu Harry Cheon scheon@ucsd.edu Chia-Lun Tsao ctsao@ucsd.edu Devanshi Jain djain@ucsd.edu Julie Hunter jmhunter@ucsd.edu Student Information Not Displayed! Organization Constitution CSI Advisor Elena Contreras Chavez To get involved and learn more about this student organization please contact the Principal Members above by email directly. Back To List Please Read! Registered student organizations are independent entities, and are not official units of UC San Diego. Therefore, UC San Diego is not responsible for the acts or omissions of registered student organizations and/or any members/persons acting on behalf of those student organizations.
